ygData.subject: Java Version 1.4 and 5.0
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi Folks, While I am checking out CVS Head and rebuilding heritrix, I run into this question.  Do you guys planning to leave compatibility with java 1.4.2 and

Hi Folks,

While I am checking out CVS Head and rebuilding heritrix, I run =
into
this question.  Do you guys planning to leave compatibility with java
=
1.4.2 and heading towards 5.0 ?  In the code, 

line 104 from org.archive.c=
rawler.processor.FilePrintWriter from
CrawlerMapper.java

and line 111 from=
 org.archive.crawler.util.SetBasedUriUniqFilter

you guys are using new Pri=
ntWriter(File file) constructor which I
don't think it is supported in 1.4.=
2.

http://java.sun.com/j2se/1.4.2/docs/api/java/io/PrintWriter.html
and on=
ly supported in 5.0 
http://java.sun.com/j2se/1.5.0/docs/api/java/io/PrintW=
riter.html 

Since ppl like us still in love with FreeBSD and wants to stay=
 with
1.4.2 will have some trouble getting the update without updating the
=
code (not that it is a big deal).

Well, I just wanted to know which direct=
ion we are going, so that I
can alert my admin getting ready to move to jav=
a 5.0 if needed :)

Thanks for the wonderful software and support.  Feel fr=
ee to let me
know if I am wrong in any comment. 

- Jay
